resources.string: Already six months did not change password.You had better change it

1.Purpose
 		Keep your accounts' passwords which is group by color , and don't worry about security problem.

 2.Security
 		This APP ask for no permission which is to say it can not upload your passwords or save it to SD card. It is saved in the private database with encrypt, so no apps could access it even if they get the root privilege.

 3.Encryption
 		Encrypted by AES(Advanced Encryption Standard) which takes billions of years to crack without your key.
 		APP will not save the encryption key,The key is your pattern which you draw when you log in, and what verify your pattern is a special text encrypted when you set your pattern, so the encryption key is safe too. 

 4.BackUp
 		This APP can not back up your passwords, so given that all the passwords will disappear when this APP is uninstalled, you'd better export your passwords once in a while and send to anywhere to keep it, such as PC disk. and nobody could crack it.

APP was opened sourced at https://github.com/Jude95/KeyChain

Copy all the passwords to the clipboard, nobody can understand it without the key, so you can stick it anywhere.
Exported encrypted text pasted into here, and enter your password to import,the duplicate passwords will be merged.
